summary: Completed testing of Banking, Accountant, and Stock Transfers modules. Backend: 21/22 tests passed (95%). Frontend: All pages load correctly with proper data display.

details: Page loads at /stock-transfers with seeded data
Stats displayed: Total Transfers (5), Pending (1), In Transit (2), Received (2)
Transfer list shows From/To warehouses, status badges, action buttons (Ship/Receive/View)
New Transfer button visible and accessible
Tab filtering (All, Draft, In Transit, Received) works
Page loads at /accountant with Dashboard tab
Dashboard shows: Total Bank Balance (₹4,51,979), 3 Bank Accounts, Monthly Deposits/Withdrawals
Bank Accounts list: HDFC (₹1,51,433), ICICI (₹81,996), SBI (₹2,18,550)
Trial Balance tab displays Chart of Accounts with account types (Expense, Equity, etc.)
All 5 tabs functional: Dashboard, Reconciliation, Journal, Trial Balance, Reports

endpoints_tested: GET /api/banking/chart-of-accounts - Returns 34 chart of accounts entries
GET/POST /api/banking/journal-entries - Lists and creates journal entries

details: Stock Transfers link visible under Inventory section
Accountant link visible under Finance section
Both links navigate to correct pages

minor.note: This is a separate endpoint not related to the current feature set

warnings.issue: Console warning about chart dimensions (-1 width/height)

critical_code_review_comments: Banking module properly implements bank accounts, transactions, reconciliation, and financial reports
Stock transfers correctly shows seeded data with proper status filtering
Accountant page integrates all banking APIs correctly
Navigation sidebar properly links to new pages
seed_data_creation: Used /api/seed/all to seed: 5 warehouses, 50 items, 600 stock records, 3 bank accounts, 34 chart of accounts entries
context_for_next_testing_agent: Banking and Stock Transfers modules fully functional. Bank accounts: HDFC, ICICI, SBI seeded. Stock transfers seeded with various statuses. Chart of accounts with 34 standard entries. All navigation links working.
